author: martinc
msg: Make the temporary file names unique across class loaders, not just within them, by including a UID in the file name.

author: rooneg
msg: Add a simple echo server example, to show how to work with sockets.
Note that this is currently only able to handle one client at a time,
when I get some free time I'll look at making it use fork or threads

author: dion
msg: Use groupId/artifactId consistently instead of simply id
